oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de la Tunisie
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Institut géographique national (France)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map on 2 sheets : col. ; 110 x 65 cm., sheet 58 x 71 cm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: dressée au Service géographique de l'armée.
Covers also a portion of Algeria and Libya.
Relief shown by shading and spot heights. Depth shown by isolines.
In French with place names in Arabic and Latin in Latin script.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale 1:800,000.
Tunisia
